Requesting  Verification of  Involvement in Non-U.S. Nuclear Bomb Tests
PL 103-446
allows for a presumption of SC for the same radiogenic diseases, regardless of whether the Veteran participated in U.S or non-U.S. nuclear tests.
Use the table below to obtain verification of a Veteran’s involvement in non-U.S. nuclear bomb tests.
